description: Make tables for AFNI group analysis programs from 3dNetCorr (*.netcc) and 3dTrackID (*.grid) outputs, with optional additional subject information from CSV files.

input_matrices.title: Input Matrices
input_matrices.description: Names of *.netcc or *.grid files with matrices to be used to make table; can be provided using wildcard chars.

input_csv.title: Input CSV
input_csv.description: Name of a CSV file to include in the table. The first column must have subject ID labels that match with the input matrix files.

input_list.title: Input List File
input_list.description: File containing paths to subject matrices and optionally CSV IDs for matching.

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: Output basename for the table and log files. Suffix and file extensions will be added for the outputs.

parameters.title: List of Parameters
parameters.description: List of matrices to be included in the table, identified by their parameter name.

date.title: Show Date
date.description: Display release/editing date of current version.

help_view.title: Show Help in Editor
help_view.description: Display help in a separate text editor.
